additional_slots_per_strength.description: Number of slots that this entity can gain per extra strength.
additional_slots_per_strength.title: Additional Slots Per Strength

can_be_siphoned_from.description: If true, the contents of this inventory can be removed by a hopper.
can_be_siphoned_from.title: Can Be Siphoned From

container_type.description: Type of container this entity has. Can be horse, minecart_chest, chest_boat, minecart_hopper, inventory, container or hopper
container_type.title: Container Type

inventory_size.description: Number of slots the container has.
inventory_size.title: Inventory Size

private.description: If true, only the entity can access the inventory.
private.title: Private

restrict_to_owner.description: If true, the entity's inventory can only be accessed by its owner or itself.
restrict_to_owner.title: Restrict To Owner
